nodes.description: 2013年7月18日，保加利亚布尔加斯发生公交车爆炸事件，造成5名以色列游客和1名保加利亚司机死亡
nodes.support_text: July 18 bus bombing that killed five Israeli tourists and a Bulgarian bus driver

nodes.description: 爆炸后，瑞典前关塔那摩囚犯Mehdi Ghezali被列为恐怖袭击嫌疑人
nodes.support_text: Swedish ex Guantanamo detainee Mehdi Ghezali may have been the suicide bomber who killed six people in July's terror attack in the Bulgarian city of Burgas

nodes.description: 保加利亚内政部和瑞典当局公开否认将Ghezali与恐怖袭击关联的指控
nodes.support_text: When I learned that they are linking this man to my people, I called my brothers in Great Britain to ask who the man in question is

nodes.description: 保加利亚《24 Chasa》日报披露极端组织头目Omar Bakri确认Ghezali为袭击者，并透露其别名和阿富汗经历
nodes.support_text: 24 Chasa daily has gained access to an interview of radical Salafite militant leader Omar Bakri, who has allegedly recognized the suspect

nodes.description: 基地组织因布尔加斯爆炸事件将Ghezali列为殉教者
nodes.support_text: Because of the Burgas bombing, the brothers from al-Qaeda declared him a martyr

nodes.description: 极端组织Al-Muhajiroun最初计划赔偿保加利亚穆斯林受害者，后因宗教警告决定取消
nodes.support_text: Muslims are warned not to hang around near Jews if they don't want to get heard
